title: 8. 표본분포

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(distrEx)
library(distrTeach)
library(TeachingDemos)
```

## 8-1. 이항분포의 모습 변화

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
p <- 0.1
x1 <- Binom(5, p)
x2 <- Binom(10, p)
x3 <- Binom(30, p)
x4 <- Binom(100, p)

fun <- function(rv, inner) {
  plot(
    rv,
    cex.points = 1,
    to.draw.arg = c("d"),
    mfColRow = FALSE,
    inner = inner,
    xlab = ""
  )
}

fun(x1, "B(5,0.1)")
fun(x2, "B(10,0.1)")
fun(x3, "B(30,0.1)")
fun(x4, "B(100,0.1)")
```
